properties.areaDesc: Coastal waters from Pt. St. George to Cape Mendocino CA out 10 nm
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 20 at 2:53AM PST until January 20 at 8:00PM PST by NWS Eureka CA
properties.description:
* WHAT...South winds increasing to 25 to 35 kt with gusts up to
45 kt, with seas building to 12 to 15 feet 10 seconds.

* WHERE...Pt St George to Cape Mendocino out 10 nm.

* WHEN...For the Gale Warning, from 8 PM this evening to 7 AM
PST Tuesday. For the Small Craft Advisory, from 10 AM this
morning to 8 PM PST this evening.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds will cause hazardous seas which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...An additional very large swell will also
arrive Tuesday, after Gale Force Winds subside.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should alter plans to avoid these hazardous conditions.
Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter course, and/or secure the
vessel for severe conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM THIS MORNING TO 8 PM PST THIS EVENING... ...GALE WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM 8 PM THIS EVENING TO 7 AM PST TUESDAY
